infos.value: The king of Leonis... Is this all you have to offer!?
Heh...heheh. Impressive, Sterne.
Why...? Why did you come here?
I already told you—to meet with you...
You...were in no shape to fight.
And yet you thought you could best me?
Wounded or not, I never believed this old body of mine could match yours.
Then why—
As I said. I simply hoped to meet with you.
You know full well that I have always been such a man. There is no reason that I would change that now.
So...I am not asking you to understand.
But...
There are certain things that cannot be conveyed without words!
The time is nigh.
Sterne. Make your decision.
Will you take this ring as your own?
What of Mont...?
Did you press Mont with the same decision?
No.
Why?
But a few moons have passed since Leonis Castle was abandoned.
And yet Mont has grown by leaps and bounds.
I know. I have never underestimated him—nor will I now.
You believe...you can best Mont?
You insinuate that I would lose...?
And so you insist that I take this ring from you?
Make your own assessment. And then...make your decision.
